data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gonçalves, Ana Clara, Mejdalani, Gabriel, Costa, Luiz Alves (2008): Five new species of Chromagallia from South America (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Agalliinae). Zootaxa 1749: 1-17, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181693
